violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
I support merging this package under the name `TMLECLI`, see https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/113591#issuecomment-2308555455

@olivierlabayle After the three-day period ends, ask in the `#pkg-registration` channel on [Slack](https://julialang.org/slack/) for a manual merge. I don't have the permissions to merge myself, but I will be happy to advocate.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: In theory, I would even support merging it early, since both #113591 and the original #113582 are well past the three-day merging period. But if it's not urgent, it's probably better to wait at least a day or two so that nobody can claim that they didn't have a chance to object, on a weekend.
